body: cmd shows the file length in parens if the `Offline` attribute set, these changes will do the same for PowerShell.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Just curious: what are perf implications for replacing property formatting by script block formatting?
Is there any way to implement the same in C#, since the formatters registration code is in C# now?

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
I considered adding direct support for delegates in the new formatting code, but it might be a bad idea.

Implicit remoting relies on sending formatting data to the client and lets the client do the formatting. I don't think we want a formatting feature that would work in this scenario.

That said, formatting is already so slow that the overhead introduced here doesn't seem to be measurable.

title: Use (n) for offline file length formatting
